definition: to manage to sell/to dispose of sth (by selling)/to get property off one's hands/to find excuses (to get off a charge)/to extricate sb (from trouble)/to vindicate/to become prettier (of child)

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

sentences.english: Desorption activating energy and pre-exponential factor were calculated.
sentences.chinese: 求出脱附活化能和指前因子。

sentences.english: Debonding was detected for hot water immersions .
sentences.chinese: 热水浸泡后能检验出脱粘。

definition: to coil hair into a bun/hair worn in bun/turban/hair ornament/to interrogate
to grow (prettier etc)/to mature into/to blossom
(of a girl) in the prime of youth
variant of 嫁妝|嫁妆[jia4 zhuang5]
lit. lotus rises from the water (idiom); fig. to blossom (of poem or art)
